com.endava.imdb.search.service.impl

Class MergeResultServiceImplementation

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.endava.imdb.search.service.impl.MergeResultServiceImplementation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MergeResultService

    @Service
public class MergeResultServiceImplementation
extends java.lang.Object
implements MergeResultService
    Created by btesila on 5/26/2014. This is a service for merging the results from all the three servers into a list of TvSeriesEntity objects in order to store them into the database for caching purposes.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MergeResultServiceImplementation() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void mergeMergedCallback()
      This method merges the results from the callback server with the ones from already partially merged results.
      java.util.List<TvSeriesEntity> mergeResult(java.lang.String sessionId)
      This method returns the merged results corresponding to a user's query.
      void mergeSyncPooling()
      This method merges the results from the sync server with the ones from the pooling server.

        public MergeResultServiceImplementation()

    • Method Detail

      • mergeResult

        public java.util.List<TvSeriesEntity> mergeResult(java.lang.String sessionId)
        This method returns the merged results corresponding to a user's query. The user is identified through the session ID. In order to be stored into the database for caching purposes, the results are firstly translated to entity objects.
        Specified by:
        mergeResult in interface MergeResultService
        Parameters:
        sessionId -
        Returns:

      • mergeSyncPooling

        public void mergeSyncPooling()
        This method merges the results from the sync server with the ones from the pooling server.

      • mergeMergedCallback

        public void mergeMergedCallback()
        This method merges the results from the callback server with the ones from already partially merged results.
